item.title: Asylum AFM API v1.0.0.3
item.description:
Product: Asylum AFM API v1.0.0.3
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 20 May 2022 08:59:02 -0400
Packager: Joseph Albro

Description: This is a LabVIEW wrapper meant to facilitate the use of the text based Asylum Instruments ActiveX API. These are the lowest level commands. Please note that these commands may be out of date. This package will need to be updated as time goes on and new functionality is needed.

Release Notes: Fixed formatting for SetPISLoop
Fixed formatting for Callback String in the SetInWave(Pair)
Better handling of the reference in debug mode (no longer will attempt to open a communication with Igor at all in debug mode)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.12.0.5
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.12.0.5
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 04 May 2022 10:20:14 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.12.0] (beta)
This release has major changes in the way configuration is handled. You should make the following changes to your code:
- "Read Configuration File" and "Write Configuration File" should be configured to <i>call parent method</i>
- "Get SMO PGSQL Log Paths" will need two front panel controls to match the parent method
- Instrument.Template.lvclass:Instrument.Template.AppLauncher has improvements to allow the user easier access to configuration
- Front panel controls
- examine configuration.ini state (and macro)
- refinements to SMO start and stop macros
- Data: Wait state
- If you use Configuration.lvclass directly (likely in UI process), should can use "Write Section" to control the ini header
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.3.10.1
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.3.10.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 04 May 2022 09:42:59 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.3.10]
- Issue #88: Parse Variant moved from private to public scope
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.3.9.2
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.3.9.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 28 Apr 2022 22:20:03 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Collection of VIs to write and read TDMS, Igor Text Files (*.itx), text-based spreadsheet data files (*.dat), postgreSQL. Tools are also provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3.

Release Notes: [3.3.9]
- Issue #87: Improved recovery from mismatched path and data lengths
- Improved code reuse and error handling in Multivalue inserts
- pg_backup moved to User\*\AppData\LevyLab\
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
